About

Jazzify.AI uses machine learning technologies to convert any song into Jazz style song. For more details, please see my post.

Disclaimer: The underlying methods are by no means comprehensive or musically appropriate. The only purpose of this application is for personal entertainment and hopefully it can give inspiration on your music creation.

Acknowledgements

This app has utilized the following open source libraries and materials:

  • Tensorflow.js for the neural network components of the jazzify process
  • abc.js for the rendering and midi playing of music scores. More information about abc notation.
  • OLPC Yamaha Piano Multisamples for the piano sound samples

The following materials on Jazz music theories have been very useful:

  • Jazz Writing by Tim Davies
  • How to turn any song into a Jazz song by Walk That Bass
